administering_body: Department of Community Correction; Department of Human Services; Arkansas Administrative Office of the Courts
governs: Requires the Department of Community Correction to provide drug counselor, probation officer, administrative assistant positions, drug testing, and treatment services for adult drug court programs based on a formula developed by the Administrative Office of the Courts and reviewed by the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee
Requires the Department of Human Services to provide similar resources for delinquency and family cases
Requires the Administrative Office of the Courts to provide funding, support, case management, and assistance to the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee for local drug court programs
